007package tagalong.subsystems.micro.augments;
008
009import tagalong.subsystems.micro.Pivot;
010
011/**
012 * Subsystem augment required for all subsystems containing 1 or more pivot
013 * microsystems.
014 */
015public interface PivotAugment {
016  /**
017   *
018   * @return The default pivot, usually ID 0
019   */
020  public Pivot getPivot();
021
022  /**
023   *
024   * @param id Integer ID of the desired pivot
025   * @return The pivot with the given ID
026   */
027  public Pivot getPivot(int id);
028}
